photo.description: Boyana Church at the foot of Vitosha Mountain (the outskirts of Sofia), Bulgaria. The Unesco World Heritage site consists of three buildings. The eastern church was built in the late 10th century, then enlarged at the beginning of the 13th century, when a second two storey building was erected next to it. The ensemble is completed by a third church, built at the beginning of the 19th century.
photo.tags: sofia bulgaria history balgariya bojanskasarkva boyanachurch saintnicholas unesco worldheritage sebastoratorkaloyan vitosha museum church orthodox christian българия софия боянскацърква heritagesite11028
photo.title: Sofia - Boyana Church (Unesco World Heritage Site)

photo.description: 2007-07-26 Boyana, BG: Boyana Church, famed for its Mediaeval frescoes. The unknown painter rejected the traditional schematic Byzantian style and opted instead for a realism not seen again until Giotto ushered in the Italian Rennaisance.
photo.tags: bulgaria sofia church
photo.title: Boyana Church

photo.description: I'd like to say 'All roads in Sofia lead to the Museum of National History' but that's far from the truth. We took quite an adventurous trip using public transport to get there (OK, the detour via Vitosha mountain and Boyana church was our insane - but worthwile - idea, still.. I believe the museum could do with some more visitors). On the other hand, all roads in the centre do seem to lead to the National Archaeological Museum, which shows as it was more crowded.
photo.tags: nationalmuseumofhistory nationalhistoricalmuseum bulgaria sofia history balgariya natsionalenistoricheskimuzey boyana vitosha orthodox earlychristianity thrace thracian roman prehistory българия софия националенисторическимузей бояна витоша heritagesite10421
photo.title: Sofia - National Museum of History This Way

photo.description: This room of the National Museum of History (mind the view of Vitosha mountain and the lovely chandelier) was filled with treasures from the Orthodox churches and early christianity.
photo.tags: nationalmuseumofhistory nationalhistoricalmuseum bulgaria sofia history balgariya natsionalenistoricheskimuzey boyana vitosha orthodox earlychristianity panorama stitch view българия софия националенисторическимузей бояна витоша heritagesite10421
photo.title: Sofia - Orthodox Treasures Room at the National Museum of History

photo.tags: yellow leaves tree colour autumn boyana sofia bulgaria light bej damniwishidtakenthat autumn2008images impressedbeauty anawesomeshot magic goldstaraward diamondclassphotographer boyanachurch church medieval unesco worldheritage color trees bulgarian wonderland
photo.title: Yellow magic in Boyana

photo.description: The Boyana Church is a small village church near Sofia. It was built in three stages: in the late 10th and early 11th, the mid-13th, and the mid-19th centuries. The Boyana Church owes its world fame above all to the frescoes from 1259. The expressive realistic portraits of the donors Sebastocrator Kaloyan and his wife Dessislava are painted with precision, extraordinary skill and feeling. The church is in the list of the World Heritage of UNESCO. www.boyanachurch.org/galeryen.htm#
photo.tags: boyana boyanachurch sofia bulgaria church medieval unesco worldheritage bulgarian orthodox autumn colour color
photo.title: Boyana Church

photo.description: The Boyana Church is a small village church near Sofia. It was built in three stages: in the late 10th and early 11th, the mid-13th, and the mid-19th centuries. The Boyana Church owes its world fame above all to the frescoes from 1259. The expressive realistic portraits of the donors Sebastocrator Kaloyan and his wife Dessislava are painted with precision, extraordinary skill and feeling. The church is in the list of the World Heritage of UNESCO. www.boyanachurch.org/galeryen.htm#
photo.tags: boyana boyanachurch sofia bulgaria church medieval unesco worldheritage bulgarian orthodox autumn colour color tree trees
photo.title: Boyana Church

photo.description: Boyana Church - officially 'Boyana Church National History Museum' and Боянска църква (pronounced Bojanska tsarkva) - is located at the foot of Vitosha Mountain (the outskirts of Sofia), Bulgaria.
photo.tags: sofia bulgaria history balgariya bojanskasarkva boyanachurch saintnicholas unesco worldheritage sebastoratorkaloyan vitosha museum church orthodox christian narthex roof ceiling българия софия боянскацърква heritagesite11028
photo.title: Sofia - Boyana Church Ceiling

photo.description: This is the oldest part of the church which was built in the 10th century. The Boyana Church is a small village church near Sofia. It was built in three stages: in the late 10th and early 11th, the mid-13th, and the mid-19th centuries. The Boyana Church owes its world fame above all to the frescoes from 1259. The expressive realistic portraits of the donors Sebastocrator Kaloyan and his wife Dessislava are painted with precision, extraordinary skill and feeling. The church is in the list of the World Heritage of UNESCO. www.boyanachurch.org/galeryen.htm#
photo.tags: boyana boyanachurch sofia bulgaria medieval church worldheritage unesco tp anawesomeshot bulgarian orthodox autumn colour color tree trees wonderland
photo.title: Boyana Church

photo.description: Besides the first layer of 11th-12th century frescoes, of which only fragments are preserved, and the famous second layer of murals from 1259, Boyana Church also has a smaller number of later frescoes from the 14th and 16th-17th century, as well as from 1882. A total of 89 scenes with 240 human images are depicted on the walls of the church.
photo.tags: sofia bulgaria history balgariya bojanskasarkva boyanachurch saintnicholas unesco worldheritage sebastoratorkaloyan vitosha museum church orthodox christian restoration restored stjohnofrila stparaskeva stpetka narthex българия софия боянскацърква heritagesite11028
photo.title: Sofia - Boyana Church Apse

photo.description: Saint Nicholas (left), the miracle maker, depicted at the Boyana Church Unesco World Heritage Site. The different layers (11th century and 1259) of paint - and 'updated' dress - are clearly visible in this photograph.
photo.tags: sofia bulgaria history balgariya bojanskasarkva boyanachurch saintnicholas unesco worldheritage sebastoratorkaloyan vitosha museum church orthodox christian narthex roof ceiling българия софия боянскацърква heritagesite11028
photo.title: Sofia - Boyana Church St Nicholas Fresco

photo.description: This part of the church was built in the mid-13th century. whc.unesco.org/en/list/42
photo.tags: church boyanachurch boyana sofia bulgaria unesco worldheritage medieval bulgarian orthodox
photo.title: Boyana Church

photo.description: Pretty, but it's the inside that is thoroughly breathtaking.
photo.tags: summer2008 vacation sofia bulgaria church boyana
photo.title: Boyana church

photo.description: Inside one could find some of the most impressive frescoes ever, thoroughly medieval yet infused with proto-renaissance sensibilities. A must see!
photo.tags: summer2008 vacation sofia bulgaria church boyana
photo.title: Boyana church entrance

photo.description: Some pics that I unearthed from a trip to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boyana. Textures courtesy of sirius-sdz.deviantart.com/
photo.tags: boyana sofia bulgaria gravestone church graveyard texture
photo.title: Бояна |

photo.description: A tombstone in the garden surrounding the Boyana Church, near Sofia, Bulgaria.
photo.tags: софия sofia bulgaria бояна boyana boyanachurch българия боянскацърква tomb tombstone grave ivy forest abandoned
photo.title: Long forgotten

photo.description: Not entirely sure about how the HRD file turned out (used Merge to HDR Pro in CS5). RAW files available if you think you can do a better job at it! Useful advice appreciated. ;) We were going to brave, and take public transport to visit Boyana Church... where we got in less than three hours. My little tourist guide said 'in about 20 minutes', but tram line 8 wasn't working. After half an hour we figured out we had to take a replacement bus (which of course left at a different, well hidden location), only to find out the bus we had to switch to didn't exists, and ending up having a lovely 60 minute tour through the Vitosha mountains. But, eventually, we made it! (And at least we were adventurous! ;)) Tip: Don't bother asking for directions in English once you're out of the Sofia city centre.
photo.tags: трамваи трам tram replacement bus toboyana inlessthanthreehours hdr cs5 mergetohdrpro sofia bulgaria софия българия balgariya bulgarije publictransport travel tourism frontrowseats ватман
photo.title: Sofia 'Трамваи 8' (Replacement Bus) HDR
